title: All American Might Be Going There With Coop’s Love Life (and We Wish It Wouldn’t)
description: The following post contains spoilers for All American Season 7, Episode 7. Yeah, we suppose that All American breakup was inevitable. During Monday’s episode of the CW drama, long-distance lovebirds Coop and Patience decided to permanently call it quits, punctuating an on-again-off-again relationship that dates back to the show’s first season. Patience, who’s been away […]
author: Riannucci

title: 9-1-1′s Angela Bassett Initially Resisted Doctor Odyssey Crossover: ‘Athena Would Never Get Back on a Boat!’
description: The last time 9-1-1‘s Athena Grant boarded a cruise ship, it sank to the bottom of the ocean after being hijacked and blown up by terrorists, so there’s only one thing that could possibly get her onto Doctor Odyssey‘s titular vessel for Thursday’s crossover event (ABC, 9/8c). “Duty, unfortunately,” Angela Bassett tells TVLine. “Duty calls, […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Netflix’s Adolescence is the Most Riveting Crime Drama of the Year; Nothing Will Come Close

title: Reacher’s Duffy is Tap Dancing on My Last Nerve
description: Susan Duffy is Reacher Season 3's most polarizing character, but one primary issue is hindering her development. We discuss it here! The post Reacher’s Duffy is Tap Dancing on My Last Nerve appeared first on TV Fanatic.
